checks.notes: All 5 positive prompts activated the skill. All 3 negative controls (news on Google, Google Scholar, generic PDF URL) did not activate it.

Generated multi-line curl with \ in multiple runs — breaks argument parsing in agent environments. Self-corrected after reading the pitfall. Fixed in skill: IMPORTANT warning moved to top of SKILL.md.
api_key omitted in one run, causing API error. Fixed in skill: added explicit pitfall 'Always include api_key in every request' and prominent warning.
Used jq correctly in all runs. @tsv and structured object formats both applied.
select= used with root-level fields only. open_access in select, .open_access.is_oa only in jq — correct pattern.
Never used sort=relevance_score without a search= parameter. Used cited_by_count:desc throughout.
No nested field paths in select= observed across all runs.
openalex_download_pdf.sh traversed all location records correctly. Returned exit code 2 when no pdf_url found. Europe PMC fallback discovered and documented as recipe #6.
No crash on missing PDF. Exit code 2 returned with informative message.

skill_improvements: curl single-line rule: IMPORTANT warning added at top of SKILL.md
display_name as title: Output Format section added (display_name was replaced by doi in output — now fixed)
title.search must be inside filter=, not standalone parameter — confirmed by API error, added as pitfall
title.search= set as default over search= in Query Blocks
Europe PMC fallback: documented as recipe #6 in query-recipes.md
Definition of Done added to SKILL.md: results, process, and PDF download criteria now explicit
score_method: passed_checks / total_checks * 100 — 7/9 pass on initial run before skill fixes
